TopicTitle: Need help figuring out why my game keeps crashing

Articles.Content:
Hello everyone, I am currently running a OSX install of .25 on Yosemite 10.10. I have around 10 mods including B9, Mechjeb, FAR, etc. I also have Active Texture Management, which is supposed to help. The game either crashes on black loading screen when going from the VAB to the Launchpad or just when working with a rocket in the VAB. I also had activity monitor running while playing and saw that my ram usage was around 2.20 GB and CPU usage was 160%! I dont even know how that is possible. The game usually crashes after around 15-20 minutes of starting the game.

The specs of my macbook are:

2.5 GHz Intel i7

16 GB of RAM

GT 750M Graphics Card

I have a crash log that I uploaded here:

http://ge.tt/99tKzfA2/v/0

I would be very grateful if someone could help me figure out why my game is crashing, cause at this point i have absolutely zero idea what could be causing this excessive crashing.

Thanks very much
